text:
Drafted April 11, 1959
Bramley Cottage
Links Road
Bramley, Surrey, England
Transcribed April 16, 1959
Department of Radio and
Television Broadcasting
University of Minnesota
Dr. Keith Engar, Manager
Station KUED
University of Utah
Salt Lake City, Utah
Dear Keiths
The material for NAEBâ€™s entry arrived yesterday morning,
and it is packed ready to go with me to Paris tomorrow.
1*11 do my best to detail the excellence of NAEB to the
broadcasters of Paris, Oslo, Stockholm, Copenhagen, Hamburg,
and West Berlin, as well as the people from the rest of
Europe Ifll be meeting in Paris and Stockholm.
With best personal regards to you (and to the carbon-
copied people mentioned below).
Yours sincerely.
Burton Paulu
BPjds
cc* William Harley
Harry Skomia
